turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Alicia, can you order me a coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which one would you like it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks in The Streets at South Point Mall on Fayetteville Rd in Durham.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, will do. What would you like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A frappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The coffee frappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I need a lot of caffeine, so let's go with a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, sounds good. Do you want it made the way it comes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, can you have them use soy milk instead of regular?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does whip cream come on that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, it doesn't.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, good, I'm lactose intolerant.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so just to confirm: you want a venti coffee frappuccino with soy milk instead of regular?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, great! So the order will be ready for pick up in about 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome! Talk to you later!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye!
